column2: BRIEF-Agree Realty Files For Common Stock Offering Of Up To $400.0 Mln - SEC Filing March 30 (Reuters) - Agree Realty Corp: * AGREE REALTY CORP FILES FOR COMMON STOCK OFFERING OF UP TO $400.0 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text: bit.ly/2UQonm8 Further company coverage:
